languages.text: "Тишина! При всем уважении, Дом Орселлио уже показал себя не в лучшем свете. Пришло время его представителям ответить перед Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "Тишина! При всем уважении, Дом Орселлио уже показал себя не в лучшем свете. Пришло время его представителям ответить перед Вольным Торговцем".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Тишина! При всем уважении, Дом Орселлио уже показал себя не в лучшем свете. Пришло время его представителям ответить перед Вольным Торговцем".

traits.locale_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has already shown itself in a bad light. It is time its representatives answer before the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has already shown itself in a bad light. It is time its representatives answer before the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “肃静！恕我直言，本日到目前为止，奥赛罗家族几乎没有为自己赢得任何荣誉。现在，是时候让它的代表回答行商浪人的问题了。”
languages.original_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “肃静！恕我直言，本日到目前为止，奥塞罗家族几乎没有为自己赢得任何荣誉。现在，是时候让它的代表回答行商浪人的问题了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Silencio! Con el debido respeto, hasta el momento la casa Orsellio no se ha cubierto precisamente de gloria hoy. Es hora de que sus representantes respondan ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «¡Silencio! Con el debido respeto, hasta el momento la casa Orsellio no se ha cubierto precisamente de gloria hoy. Es hora de que sus representantes respondan ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「静かに！失礼ながら、オーセリオ家の今は栄光に包まれているとはいい難いものです。代表団は、自由開拓者の前に問に答えるときが来たのです」
languages.original_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「静かに！失礼ながら、オーセリオ家の今は栄光に包まれているとはいい難いものです。代表団は、自由開拓者の前に問に答えるときが来たのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ruhe! Bei allem Respekt, das Haus Orsellio hat sich heute bislang wahrlich nicht mit Ruhm bekleckert. Es ist Zeit, dass seine Vertreter {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} Rede und Antwort stehen."
languages.original_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhe! Bei allem Respekt, das Haus Orsellio hat sich heute bislang wahrlich nicht mit Ruhm bekleckert. Es ist Zeit, dass seine Vertreter {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} Rede und Antwort stehen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Silence ! Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, la maison Orsellio est très loin de s'être couverte de gloire, aujourd'hui. Il est temps que ses représentants répondent de leurs actes devant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Silence ! Avec tout le respect que je vous dois, la maison Orsellio est très loin de s'être couverte de gloire, aujourd'hui. Il est temps que ses représentants répondent de leurs actes devant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Sessizlik! Saygısızlık olarak algılamayın ama Orsellio Hanesi bugün bir kez bile onurlu bir eylemde bulunmadı. Hane temsilcileri, Hür Tacir karşısında sorguya çekilmeli."
languages.original_text: "Silence! With all due respect, House Orsellio has hardly covered itself in glory thus far today. It is time its representatives answered before the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Sessizlik! Saygısızlık olarak algılamayın ama Orsellio Hanesi bugün bir kez bile kendini onurlu gösterecek bir eylemde bulunmadı. Temsilcilerin Hür Tacir karşısında sorguya çekilmesinin zamanı geldi."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
